snippet.title: Caveman World: Mountains of Unga Boonga Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Caveman World: Mountains of Unga Boonga is a 2.5D platformer / fantasy adventure game set in Prehistoric time. You play as a Caveman, exploring various levels and overcoming physical obstacles. Levels become increasingly more difficult as you encounter new enemies, obstacles, traps and more!

CURRENT STATE
The game is currently ready to release, we will continue to improve things while we wait to be greenlit.

Game will come with Steam Cards, we will work on Steam Achievements.

Checkout more on Steam Greenlight:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=599447475
